alert.note: Alert for Baraga (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 5:54PM EDT by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Iron, north central Dickinson, west central Marquette and south central Baraga Counties through 630 PM EDT/530 PM CDT/... At 554 PM EDT/454 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near U.S. 141 between Covington and Amasa, or 17 miles north of Iron River, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Squaw Lake, Amasa, U.S. 141 between Covington and Amasa, Witch Lake, Republic, Humboldt and Bone Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
